metadata.title: CVE-2023-4197 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Improper input validation in Dolibarr ERP CRM <= v18.0.1 fails to stripcertain PHP code from user-supplied input when creating a Website, allowingan attacker to inject and evaluate arbitrary PHP code.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
